decisions.what: CVA tracking should be based on actual Statsig results applied to baseline numbers, not business case projections
decisions.context: Clarifying methodology after confusion about whether CVA values should use business case estimates or actual experimental results. Team agreed to duplicate BC and add 'Results' suffix to track estimations vs actuals.

decisions.what: Welcome gift CVA impact will be calculated based on CVR/CAC improvements in known channels and scaled to all channels
decisions.context: Needed to translate welcome gift's strong marketing campaign performance into overall CVA number for KR definition, noting it's currently <10% of marketing mix

decisions.what: OTP MVP will be presented at product review, followed by reactivations experience later
decisions.context: Team selecting which products to showcase at upcoming product review session

decisions.what: TPT does not use plan_type as a separate subscription-level entity; it's baked into SKU
decisions.context: Clarifying data model differences between brands after PA reported plan_types aren't used at subscription level

blockers.description: Welcome gift analysis needs to be completed to calculate overall CVR uplift impact, not just marketing campaign-specific results
blockers.impact: Cumulative OKR tracking and CVA reporting

blockers.description: No dashboard readily available to track Good Chop 12-month net revenue per Paid Conversion metric
blockers.impact: OKR/domain objective tracking and QAR reporting

blockers.description: Search & prod cards too early for CVA analysis
No recent releases to update CVA tracker
TPT waiting for retention results from air dried cadence test (conversion was negative as expected)
blockers.impact: TPT OKR updates and cumulative tracker

blockers.description: Welcome gift campaigns currently <10% of marketing mix, limiting overall CVA impact

action_items.task: Delete non-actual CVA values from spreadsheet
Review PO AI integration flows on Miro and add comments/questions
Update cumulative OKRs with latest results/analyses
Calculate welcome gift CVA by scaling CVR/CAC impacts from known channels
Get precise number from marketing on welcome gift campaign spend proportion
Present OTP MVP at product review
Present reactivations experience at product review (after OTP)
Consider presenting Lovable revamp or funnel mixing at product review

key_context.summary: Team clarified that CVA should be calculated using actual Statsig experiment results applied to baseline numbers, not business case projections. They duplicate business cases and add 'Results' suffix to compare estimations with actuals.
key_context.relevance: Critical for accurate OKR tracking and ensuring data integrity across all new ventures brands

key_context.summary: Welcome gift campaigns show +80% CVR improvement vs BAU marketing campaigns, but currently represent <10% of marketing mix. CVA impact calculated by scaling known channel improvements, expected to grow as campaigns scale.
key_context.relevance: Major potential revenue driver for Good Chop that needs careful tracking as it scales

key_context.topic: Good Chop Revenue Metric Tracking Gap
key_context.summary: No readily available dashboard tracks the domain objective of $550 12-month net revenue per Paid Conversion. Adaptive is likely source of truth but not easily accessible for regular tracking.
key_context.relevance: Impacts ability to report on key business metrics during QARs and track progress on Yury's domain objectives

key_context.summary: TPT uses plan types (Fresh, Dry, Mixed) but they're baked into SKUs, not separate subscription-level entities. Good Chop doesn't use plan types, only number of cuts.
key_context.relevance: Important for data architecture decisions and understanding product analytics across brands

key_context.summary: Ed mentioned Pets Table, Good Chop, and Factor Form at all-hands as challenging the subscription model, alongside genAI hackathon recognition.
key_context.relevance: Shows executive visibility and strategic importance of new ventures initiatives

key_context.summary: Team reminded multiple times to update cumulative OKRs before next cycle. Last update was in April, creating significant gap in tracking. Several initiatives lack completed analyses.
key_context.relevance: Critical for demonstrating progress and maintaining credibility in OKR process

key_context.summary: U03TY4YJU4X developing PO AI integration model in Miro, requesting team review of flows and identification of areas where unstructured data processing could save time.
key_context.relevance: Strategic initiative to improve product operations efficiency through AI automation

summary: New ventures product team discusses CVA tracking methodology, clarifying that actual experiment results (not business case projections) should be used. Welcome gift shows strong performance (+80% CVR) but needs scaling, while team works to update cumulative OKRs and prepare product review presentations for OTP MVP and other initiatives.
